mapper.insert: insert into db_ywexpresstype (SID, EXPRESSTYPE, 'PACKAGE', CURRENCY, A4, A6, A7, CNMINIPARCEL10X10, LABELSTR) values (#{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expresstype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dbPackage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{a4,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{a6,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{a7,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cnminiparcel10x10,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{labelstr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_ywexpresstype set EXPRESSTYPE = #{expresstype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'PACKAGE' = #{dbPackage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CURRENCY = #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, A4 = #{a4,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, A6 = #{a6,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, A7 = #{a7,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CNMINIPARCEL10X10 = #{cnminiparcel10x10,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LABELSTR = #{labelstr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select SID, EXPRESSTYPE, 'PACKAGE', CURRENCY, A4, A6, A7, CNMINIPARCEL10X10, LABELSTR from db_ywexpresstype
